import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import classnames from 'classnames' import {completeTodo, deleteTodo} from '../actions' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import EditTodo from './EditTodo' const Todo = ({status,content,id,created,dead,dispatch}, props) => { return (
dispatch(completeTodo(id))}>
{created}
{dead}
dispatch(deleteTodo(id))}>
) } export default connect() (Todo) Todo.propTypes = { id:PropTypes.string.isRequired, content:PropTypes.string.isRequired, status:PropTypes.bool.isRequired, created:PropTypes.string.isRequired, dead:PropTypes.string.isRequired,}
